3.title: Operation Hours
3.text:
OPEN: Tuesday through Saturday</br>
LUNCH: 11:30 a.m.–2 p.m.</br>
DINNER: 6–9:30 p.m.</br></br>

BOUNTY LOUNGE:
Tuesday through Friday

4.title: RESERVATIONS
4.text:
For reservations please call us at +51 32 231 111, or make an online reservation.

Ulu Restaurant is located in the centre of New York city, at 49 Geraldin Lane, New York, NY 10013
